Summary: Light that moved around and scanned, there were other small flashes of light surrounding the larger one.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Savannah
There was one other sighting in Savannah on or around February 20th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis sighting is not the first for me, I can set outside my house on most nights and see strange lights flashing,blinking and fading in and out. I was able to get a better view with my cell phone than my camera. This light will stay sometimes for hours while moving in different directions.If you set it to full screen you can see the small blue and white lights that are blinking a little ways away from the light.
